Articles.Content:
Hi,

My name is Chris, 25 Years old and I live in the Ithaca.I've always had an interest to learn different things and that's the only reason I am here and I think Kerbal is the right place to learn valuable things.

Welcome aboard! And you're absolutely right, KSP has been a wonderful experience for me over the past two years. I've only ever advanced my interest in space, and indeed can understand things I didn't think of before. I'm still learning to this day, as a matter of fact

Ithaca NY? Or Ithaca in Greece?

Either way, welcome aboard!
Hello Chris and all other members welcome to the forum.BTW I am also new to this forum and just join the chats.
